text: @green_realist @semiwittybrad @SwitchAtoll @twpolk @florian_krammer @chrislhayes Deaths are making a comeback and may follow these recent hospitalizations.  Hopefully not.  Herd immunity is not a goal. 40% of SARS survivors still getting treatment 5 years later. We don't even know if immunity is a thing.
